title: Miyaxwen! men miyaxwen!
dialogue: Salvadoor: Ne’ netew Salvadoor, hicha ‘e’ etew?
dialogue_eng: Salvadoor: I call myself Salvadoor, what do you call yourself?
Salvadoor: Okay! and where are you from?
Luupi: I am from Cahuilla (Reservation)! and where are you from?
Salvadoor: I am from Torres Martinez (Reservation)

title: Miyaxwen pish emexive?
dialogue: Luupi: Heehe! Pen 'e'? Miyaxwen pish emexive ivax?
dialogue_eng: Salvadoor: How are you feeling today?
Luupi: Yes! And you? How are you feeling today?
Salvadoor: I am very happy also!
